promptsAndAnswers.message: Please do not use bad words
Hello there! How are you doing today?

promptsAndAnswers.pattern: /what(')?s your name|who(')?s your owner|who made you/i

promptsAndAnswers.message: Treasure is a programmer based on ReactJS and NodeJS. He is the owner of a YouTube channel called Creative Tutorials

promptsAndAnswers.pattern: /tell me about developer profiles|how to create a developer profile|developer profile setup/i
promptsAndAnswers.message: Creating a developer profile is easy! You can start by clicking on your profile picture and selecting 'Create Developer Profile'. From there, you can fill in details about your skills, work experience, projects, and accomplishments.
You can search for developers with the skill '{1}' by using the Skill Search feature. Just enter the skill in the search bar, and you'll find a list of developers who match your criteria.

promptsAndAnswers.pattern: /how can I sign up|create an account|login|password reset/i
promptsAndAnswers.message: To get started, click on the 'Sign Up' button to create an account. If you already have an account, click 'Login'. If you forget your password, use the 'Forgot Password' option to reset it.

promptsAndAnswers.pattern: /how do I make a payment|payment methods|secure transactions/i
promptsAndAnswers.message: We use Stripe for secure payment transactions. When you hire a developer or pay for a service, you'll be prompted to enter your payment details. Rest assured, it's safe and reliable.

promptsAndAnswers.pattern: /how can I leave a review|rate a developer|feedback/i
promptsAndAnswers.message: You can leave a review and rate a developer after completing a project together. Simply go to the developer's profile, and you'll find an option to provide feedback and a star rating.
Check out the 'Events' section to discover upcoming developer events, workshops, and meetups in your area. You can also create your own events to connect with the community.
Our platform boasts a visually appealing and responsive user interface. We've utilized React UI libraries and frameworks to ensure an optimal user experience across all devices and screen sizes.

promptsAndAnswers.pattern: /tell me about DevLink Marketplace|what is DevLink|about the platform/i
promptsAndAnswers.message: DevLink Marketplace is a cutting-edge platform for developers, clients, and employers. It revolutionizes the way developers connect, showcase their skills, and find exciting opportunities.
